mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:description: H.W. Crothers Wheeling Nov 24 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 24 1861. What does it mean I have rec'd from Crispin about three hundred 300 revolvers four 4 inches playthings for children. I have refused them such weapons not intended for a regiment which intend to do good faithful service H. Anisansel Col 1st Va Cav 37D116pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Anisansel, Henry
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Crothers, H. W.
